details.note: Silence implies acceptance of dates; we still need named owners per front.
details.ask: Relay to all fronts: send owner names for M1 and M3 or object to dates

summary: War Office relay: collect M1/M3 owner names by short fuse; dates locked M1=2025-11-28, M3=2025-12-05
instructions: War Office: relay and collect owner names for M1 and M3 by the deadline
Fronts: reply with owner names (or objection + new dates) via report/ack
If no reply, dates stay locked and owners remain unassigned
